property.name: description
property.value: The number of paper copies of the proposal that should be mailed to the agency/sponsor.

property.name: description
property.value: This field determines whether the Sponsored Programs Office or the department will be mailing the proposal to the agency/sponsor.

property.name: description
property.value: The method by which the proposal will be delivered to the agency/sponsor.

property.name: description
property.value: The internal school account number that should be charged the mailing costs.

property.name: description
property.value: Any information that will assist in the delivery of the proposal.
